-c <config>: Specify the configuration file to use (default: config.xml)
-r: Start in realtime scheduler mode (simulation time follows real elapsed time)
-R: Start in fastest scheduler mode (run events as fast as possible)
-x: Auto-terminate when the scheduler ends (no effect in terminal-only mode)
-t: Terminal-only mode (no GUI / no OpenGL window)
-s <maxDate>: Run scheduler in bounded-time mode: stop when event list is empty OR when simulation time reaches <maxDate> (microseconds)
-s inf: Infinite duration: only stops when you press Q (in GUI)
-k <type>: Force module type for “generic” blockcode execution. Options: {BB, RB, SB, C2D, C3D, MR}
-l: Enable log output to simulation.log (only if built with LOGFILE enabled)
-e: Export final configuration when the simulation finishes
--replay [filename]: Enable replay export; optional filename sets the output replay file name
--debug-replay: Enable replay export and also create a text debug file for the replay
--replay-min-delay <delay>: Minimum delay (microseconds) between two replay keyframes (advanced)
